title: How a Stock Market Turns Investors Into Gamblers - Ep 32
itunes:title: How a Stock Market Turns Investors Into Gamblers - Ep 32
description:
What do a degenerate gambler and a stock market investor have in common? Vitaliy discusses this question, using a real estate example.

You can read this article online at: https://contrarianedge.com/how-a-stock-market-turns-investors-into-gamblers/
